Response Spectrum Generator settings file

Folder with input time histories in .ahl or .csv format:
folder = C:\Users\pnidamaluri\Documents\pythonscripts\modules\GenerateResponseSpectra\test_folder

Critical damping ratio:
zeta = 0.05

Generate RS up to 1000Hz (y) or just 100Hz (n)?
ext = y

Choose RS generation method (fft, or shake):
method =shake
